== New brand launch meeting ==

=== Summary ===

Soon we'll be launching the new look for Ubuntu and Canonical. Lets have a meeting to discuss how this is going to impact community teams and also how we can work together to create and implement high-quality resources that will be broadly useful.

=== Location ===

(tentatively) #ubuntu-meeting
(tentatively) Thursday 20th May 16:00 UTC

=== Leader ===

Matthew Nuzum aka newz2000 http://launchpad.net/~newz

=== Agenda ===

* Announcing forthcoming theme changes
* Resources from Canonical
* What we should and should not do
* Working together to create great themes
* What we need to produce
* Who will help
